scripts.dev: concurrently "cd LocalShopWEB && npm run dev" "cd LocalShopAPI-Map && npm run dev" "cd LocalShopAPI-Notifications && npm run dev" "cd LocalShopAPI-Reports && npm run dev" "cd LocalShopAPI-Shop && npm run dev" "cd LocalShopAPI-Store && npm run dev" "cd LocalShopAPI-Users && npm run dev" "cd LocalShopAPI-History && npm run dev" "cd api-gateway && npm run dev"
scripts.update: concurrently "cd LocalShopWEB && npm i" "cd LocalShopAPI-Map && npm i" "cd LocalShopAPI-Notifications && npm i" "cd LocalShopAPI-Reports && npm i" "cd LocalShopAPI-Shop && npm i" "cd LocalShopAPI-Store && npm i" "cd LocalShopAPI-Users && npm i" "cd LocalShopAPI-History && npm i" "cd api-gateway && npm i"
